summary: A test suite that quickly validates the UnCLIP image variation pipeline by creating lightweight dummy components and inputs, then checking core behaviors such as attention slicing, output format consistency, half‑precision inference, batch stability, model saving/loading, and handling of various image input forms.
business_intent: Provide fast, reliable verification of the UnCLIP image variation pipeline to catch regressions early, ensure correct functionality across different scenarios, and support continuous integration for production‑ready deployment.
